logos.title: Built on science, not hustle culture

introduce.title: What is Dreamcatcher
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Dreamcatcher is your personal timing coach — helping you understand your natural energy cycles so you can make every effort count.

items.title: Know Your Energy Type
items.description: Discover whether you're a morning lark, night owl, or somewhere in between — and work with your biology, not against it.

items.title: Timing Predictions
items.description: Get personalized recommendations on the best times for focused work, creative thinking, meetings, and rest.

items.title: Energy Tracking
items.description: Track your energy levels throughout the day and discover patterns you never noticed before.

items.title: Action Guidance
items.description: Receive daily guidance on when to push forward, when to pause, and when to consolidate your gains.

benefits.title: Why Timing Matters More Than Effort
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: You've been told to work harder. What if the secret is working at the right time?

items.title: It's Not You — It's Your Timing
items.description: That afternoon slump isn't laziness. It's biology. Learn to work with your ultradian rhythms instead of fighting them.

items.title: Effort × Timing = Impact
items.description: The same effort produces dramatically different results depending on when you apply it. Stop multiplying by zero.

items.title: Recover Like an Athlete
items.description: Elite athletes know that recovery is when improvement happens. Apply sports science to your cognitive performance.

usage.title: How Dreamcatcher Works
usage.description: Start aligning your effort with optimal timing in three simple steps:

items.title: Connect Your Data
items.description: Sync your calendar, fitness tracker, or simply log your energy levels manually.

items.title: Discover Your Patterns
items.description: Our AI analyzes your rhythms to identify your peak performance windows and recharge periods.

items.title: Get Daily Guidance
items.description: Receive personalized recommendations on what to focus on and when — delivered exactly when you need them.

items.title: Multiply Your Impact
items.description: Watch your productivity soar as you stop fighting against your natural cycles and start working with them.

features.title: Everything You Need to Master Your Timing
features.description: Tools designed to help you work smarter, not harder.

items.title: Personal Energy Dashboard
items.description: Visualize your daily energy patterns and see your optimal performance windows at a glance.

items.title: Smart Calendar Integration
items.description: Your schedule automatically optimized for your personal rhythm — no more meetings during your slump.

items.title: Habit Timing Analysis
items.description: Learn which habits amplify your energy and which drain it — and when to practice each.

items.title: Weekly Energy Reports
items.description: See how your energy changed over the week and understand what influenced it.

items.title: Rest Optimization
items.description: Get reminded to rest before you burn out — and learn what type of rest you actually need.

items.title: Community Insights
items.description: See how others with similar energy types are thriving — and learn from their timing strategies.

stats.title: People Are Finally Breaking Free from Hustle Culture
stats.description: Join thousands who've discovered that timing beats grinding.

testimonials.title: What Users Say About Dreamcatcher
testimonials.description: Real stories from people who stopped grinding and started timing.

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.quote: I used to feel guilty about not being productive after 3pm. Dreamcatcher showed me that's my creative thinking window. Now I schedule accordingly and my output has doubled.

items.name: Marcus Johnson
items.quote: The biggest insight was learning that my best coding happens between 9-11am. I protect those hours fiercely now. No more meetings, no more email — just deep work.

items.name: Elena Rodriguez
items.quote: I was burning out trying to be 'on' all day. Now I understand my ultradian rhythms and take intentional breaks. Same hours, way more impact.

items.name: David Park
items.quote: As a freelancer, I used to feel guilty about downtime. Dreamcatcher helped me see rest as productive. My best ideas come during my recovery periods.

items.name: Priya Sharma
items.quote: I schedule strategic thinking for my peak hours and administrative tasks for my low-energy periods. It seems obvious now, but I had never thought about it this way.

items.name: Tom Anderson
items.quote: My writing improved dramatically once I started writing during my peak creative hours. I produce more in 2 focused hours than I used to in 8 tired ones.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Dreamcatcher
faq.description: Have another question? Reach out — we're happy to help.

items.question: What exactly is Dreamcatcher?
items.answer: Dreamcatcher is a personal timing coach that helps you understand when to work, when to rest, and when to consolidate based on your unique energy patterns and circadian rhythm.

items.question: How does Dreamcatcher know my energy patterns?
items.answer: We analyze data from your fitness tracker, calendar, or manual energy logs to identify your personal rhythms. Our AI recognizes patterns that you might not notice yourself.

items.question: Is this just another productivity app?
items.answer: No. Most productivity apps tell you to do more. Dreamcatcher tells you when to do things. We're not about cramming more into your day — we're about doing the right things at the right time.

items.question: How long until I see results?
items.answer: Most users notice a difference within the first week as they start protecting their peak hours. More profound insights emerge after 2-3 weeks of tracking.

items.question: What if my schedule is unpredictable?
items.answer: Dreamcatcher works even with irregular schedules. We help you find the patterns within the chaos and identify micro-windows of opportunity you might be missing.

items.question: Can I use this with my team?
items.answer: Yes! Teams can use Dreamcatcher to optimize meeting schedules and project timelines. When everyone understands their timing, collaboration becomes much more effective.

cta.title: Start Working with Your Timing, Not Against It
cta.description: Your best work is waiting to happen at the right time.

subscribe.title: Get Timing Tips Delivered Weekly
subscribe.description: Join our newsletter for insights on energy and timing.
